TEXT.TITLE: U.S. M-1 MONEY SUPPLY RISES 500 MLN DLRS
TEXT.BODY: U.S. M-1 money supply rose 500 mln dlrs to a seasonally adjusted 738.7 billion dlrs in the March 9 week, the Federal Reserve said. The previous week's M-1 level was revised to 738.2 billion dlrs from 738.0 billion, while the four-week moving average of M-1 rose to 738.2 billion dlrs from 737.2 billion. Economists polled by Reuters said that M-1 would be anywhere from unchanged to up five billion dlrs. The average forecast called for a 2.3 billion dlr increase. Reuter
